author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Surana Industries' board meeting on November 09, 2017
description: Pursuant to the Regulation 29(1)(a) of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, the 09th day of November, 2017 inter-alia to consider and approve the Un-Audited financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2017.
articleBody: Pursuant to the Regulation 29(1)(a) of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, the 09th day of November, 2017 inter-alia to consider and approve the Un-Audited financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2017.  Further, in terms of the Company's 'Code of Conduct to Regulate, Monitor and Report Trading by Insiders', adopted under SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company shall remain closed from 06th November, 2017 to 14th November, 2017 (both days inclusive).Source : BSE

headline: Surana Industries: Outcome of AGM
description: Proceedings of 26th Annual General Meeting ('AGM') and voting results.

headline: Surana Industries' board meeting on August 10, 2017
description: Pursuant to the Regulation 29(1)(a) of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, the 10th day of August, 2017 inter-alia to consider and approve the Un-Audited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2017.
articleBody: Pursuant to the Regulation 29(1)(a) of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, the 10th day of August, 2017 inter-alia to consider and approve the Un-Audited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2017.  Further, in terms of the Company's 'Code of Conduct to Regulate, Monitor and Report Trading by Insiders', adopted under SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company shall remain closed from 07th August, 2017 to 14th August, 2017 (both days inclusive).Source : BSE

headline: Surana Industries: Outcome of board meeting
description: Surana Industries Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on January 18, 2017, has considered and approved the calling of Extra-Ordinary General Meeting on March 24, 2017 for Appointment of Statutory Auditor to fill casual vacancy.

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Surana Industries director Krishna Udupa resigns
description: Surana Industries has informed that the Company has received the resignation letter from Krishna Udupa to relive him from the position of Non-Executive Director of the Company with effect from the closing hours of business on September 30, 2016. The same shall be placed before the Board for its consideration in the ensuing board meeting of the Co.
articleBody: Surana Industries Ltd has informed BSE that the Company has received the resignation letter from Shri. Krishna Udupa to relive him from the position of Non-Executive Director of the Company with effect from the closing hours of business on September 30, 2016. The same shall be placed before the Board for its consideration in the ensuing board meeting of the Company.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Surana Ind

headline: Surana Industries allotment committee meeting on March 14, 2016
description: Surana Industries Ltd has informed BSE that a Meeting of the Allotment Committee of Board of Directors of the Company will be held on March 14, 2016. The Committee will consider allotting shares on Preferential Basis to Shri Dineshchand Surana, Promoter of the Company as per the CDR Package.
articleBody: Surana Industries Ltd has informed BSE that a Meeting of the Allotment Committee of Board of Directors of the Company will be held on March 14, 2016. The Committee will consider allotting shares on Preferential Basis to Shri Dineshchand Surana, Promoter of the Company as per the CDR Package.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Surana Ind

articleBody: Surana Industries Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 07, 2015, inter alia, to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results for the Second Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2015.Further, as per the Company’s Code of Conduct for Regulating, Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders, the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company will remain closed for all connected persons covered under the said Code from October 28, 2015 to November 09, 2015.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Surana Ind

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Surana Industries appoints Soundharya Panchapakesan as director
description: Surana Industries has informed that the Board of Directors of the Company vide circular resolution have appointed Smt. Soundharya Panchapakesan as an Additional Director in the category of Woman Director (Non-Executive) of the company with effect from June 30, 2015 subject to the approval of the shareholders at the ensuing General Meeting.
articleBody: Surana Industries Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company vide circular resolution have appointed Smt. Soundharya Panchapakesan as an Additional Director in the category of Woman Director (Non-Executive) of the company with effect from June 30, 2015 subject to the approval of the shareholders at the ensuing General Meeting of the Company.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Surana Ind

headline: Surana Industries director B. S. Patil resigns
description: Surana Industries has informed about the resignation of Shri. B. S. Patil, Non-Executive Independent Director of the Company dated January 14, 2015 due to his appointment as Chairman, Expert Committee on BBMP Restructuring with additional responsibilities by the Govt. of Karnataka.
